title: 23: Behavioral Dimensions of Food Security
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description: Welcome back to Mad Hat Economics!  Today we’re joined by Masters Student Prankur Gupta to talk about behavioral dimensions of food security and his work in India on food security and policy.
